tool_description: Enriches company information by fetching additional data from external sources including company size, industry, revenue, founding date, and key personnel details.

company_names.description: Array of company names to enrich

company_domains.description: Array of company domains to enrich

data_sources.description: Data sources to use: linkedin, crunchbase, clearbit, owler, zoominfo

fields_to_enrich.description: Fields to enrich: industry, size, revenue, founded_year, description, location, employees

match_confidence.description: Minimum confidence score for company matching (0.1 to 1.0)

max_results_per_company.description: Maximum number of enrichment results per company

priority_source.description: Preferred data source when conflicts occur

error_messages: No input provided: Either company_names or company_domains must be provided.
Invalid data source: Use supported sources [linkedin, crunchbase, clearbit, owler, zoominfo].
Invalid enrichment field: Use supported fields [industry, size, revenue, founded_year, description, location, employees].
Invalid confidence score: match_confidence must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
API quota exceeded: Daily enrichment quota has been reached.
Timeout error: Request timed out, consider increasing timeout_seconds.
Invalid priority source: priority_source must be one of the selected data_sources.
usage: Provide either company names or domains, specify data sources and fields to enrich. Adjust match_confidence for stricter matching. Returns enriched company data with confidence scores and source attribution.

enriched_companies.description: Array of enriched company data records

enrichment_summary.description: Summary of enrichment results and coverage

failed_enrichments.description: Companies that could not be enriched
